mapper.select: SELECT TUR.USER_REQUEST_ID , TUR.USER_REQUEST_DATE , TC.CATEGORY_NAME , TS.SERVICE_NAME , TL.REGION , TL.CITY , TUR.USER_REQUEST_CONTENT , TU.USER_STAR_RATE , TUR.USER_REQUEST_PROGRESS , TU.USER_NAME , TU.USER_ID , TBL_PRO_UPLOAD.PRO_UPLOAD_TITLE , TUR.USER_REQUEST_PAY FROM TBL_USER_REQUEST TUR INNER JOIN TBL_PRO_UPLOAD ON TUR.PRO_UPLOAD_ID = TBL_PRO_UPLOAD.PRO_UPLOAD_ID INNER JOIN TBL_SERVICE ts ON TBL_PRO_UPLOAD.SERVICE_ID = TS.SERVICE_ID INNER JOIN TBL_CATEGORY tc ON TS.CATEGORY_ID = TC.CATEGORY_ID INNER JOIN TBL_USER TU ON TU.USER_ID = TUR.USER_ID INNER JOIN TBL_LOCATION tl ON TU.LOCATION_ID = TL.LOCATION_ID WHERE TUR.USER_REQUEST_ID = #{userRequestId}

SELECT tur.USER_ID, tur.PRO_ID, tp.PRO_NAME, tur.USER_REVIEW_TITLE, tur.USER_REVIEW_CONTENT, tur.USER_REVIEW_RATE, tur.USER_REVIEW_DATE FROM TBL_USER_REVIEW tur INNER JOIN TBL_PRO tp ON TUR.USER_ID = TP.PRO_ID WHERE TUR.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY TUR.USER_REVIEW_DATE DESC
